languages.text: Потоки варпа накладывают на цели штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП.
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Потоки варпа накладывают на цели штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП.
Потоки варпа накладывают на цели штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП.

languages.text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Потоки варпа накладывают на цели штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП.

traits.locale_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a penalty to their dodge, BS, and MP.

The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

languages.text: 由于受到亚空间湍流影响，该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 由于受到亚空间湍流影响，该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: ワープの流れにより、生物の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を付与。
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ワープの流れにより、生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を付与。

languages.text: Las corrientes de la disformidad provocan que las criaturas sufran una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las corrientes de la disformidad provocan que las criaturas sufran una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.

languages.text: Die Warpströme führen dazu, dass Kreaturen einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} erleiden.
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Warpströme führen dazu, dass Kreaturen einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} erleiden.

languages.text: Les courants du Warp infligent aux créatures une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les courants du Warp infligent aux créatures une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.

languages.text: Öte akıntıları; yaratıkların {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} değerlerine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} almalarına sebep olur.
languages.original_text: The warp currents make creatures suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
